txt.en: Karazgar, the Weeping Warrior, has ventured into the Anvil to claim the Herald of Winter and her Frost-horde.
The Anvil of Winterstith: Karazgar and Vethúg -- Tier 2
Defeat Karazgar the Weeping Warrior and Vethúg Wintermind
Karazgar, the Weeping Warrior, has ventured into the Anvil to claim the Herald of Winter and her Frost-horde.
You have slain Vethúg Wintermind, ending the powerful drake's reign of terror.
